00012 ASIAuthenticationDialog *sharedDialog = nil;
00013 NSLock *dialogLock = nil;

00019 @implementation ASIAuthenticationDialog
00020 
00021 + (void)initialize
00022 {
00023         if (self == [ASIAuthenticationDialog class]) {
00024                 dialogLock = [[NSLock alloc] init];
00025         }
00026 }
00027 
00028 + (void)presentProxyAuthenticationDialogForRequest:(ASIHTTPRequest *)request
00029 {
00030         [dialogLock lock];
00031         [sharedDialog release];
00032         sharedDialog = [[self alloc] init];
00033         [sharedDialog setRequest:request];
00034         [sharedDialog setType:ASIProxyAuthenticationType];
00035         [sharedDialog show];
00036         [dialogLock unlock];    
00037 }
00038 
00039 + (void)presentAuthenticationDialogForRequest:(ASIHTTPRequest *)request
00040 {
00041         [dialogLock lock];
00042         [sharedDialog release];
00043         sharedDialog = [[self alloc] init];
00044         [sharedDialog setRequest:request];
00045         [sharedDialog show];
00046         [dialogLock unlock];
00047         
00048 }
00049 
00050 - (void)show
00051 {
00052         // Create an action sheet to show the login dialog
00053         [self setLoginDialog:[[[UIActionSheet alloc] init] autorelease]];
00054         [[self loginDialog] setActionSheetStyle:UIActionSheetStyleBlackOpaque];
00055         [[self loginDialog] setDelegate:self];
00056         
00057         // We show the login form in a table view, similar to Safari's authentication dialog
00058         UITableView *table = [[[UITableView alloc] initWithFrame:CGRectMake(0,80,320,480) style:UITableViewStyleGrouped] autorelease];
00059         [table setDelegate:self];
00060         [table setDataSource:self];
00061         [[self loginDialog] addSubview:table];
00062         [[self loginDialog] showInView:[[[UIApplication sharedApplication] windows] objectAtIndex:0]];
00063         [[self loginDialog] setFrame:CGRectMake(0,0,320,480)];
00064         
00065         // Setup the title (Couldn't figure out how to put this in the same toolbar as the buttons)
00066         UIToolbar *titleBar = [[[UIToolbar alloc] initWithFrame:CGRectMake(0,0,320,30)] autorelease];
00067         UILabel *label = [[[UILabel alloc] initWithFrame:CGRectMake(10,0,300,30)] autorelease];
00068         if ([self type] == ASIProxyAuthenticationType) {
00069                 [label setText:@"Login to this secure proxy server."];
00070         } else {
00071                 [label setText:@"Login to this secure server."];
00072         }
00073         [label setTextColor:[UIColor blackColor]];
00074         [label setFont:[UIFont systemFontOfSize:13.0]];
00075         [label setShadowColor:[UIColor colorWithRed:1 green:1 blue:1 alpha:0.5]];
00076         [label setShadowOffset:CGSizeMake(0, 1.0)];
00077         [label setOpaque:NO];
00078         [label setBackgroundColor:nil];
00079         [label setTextAlignment:UITextAlignmentCenter];
00080         
00081         [titleBar addSubview:label];
00082         [[self loginDialog] addSubview:titleBar];
00083         
00084         // Setup the toolbar 
00085         UIToolbar *toolbar = [[[UIToolbar alloc] initWithFrame:CGRectMake(0,30,320,50)] autorelease];
00086 
00087         NSMutableArray *items = [[[NSMutableArray alloc] init] autorelease];
00088         UIBarButtonItem *backButton = [[[UIBarButtonItem alloc] initWithBarButtonSystemItem:UIBarButtonSystemItemCancel target:self action:@selector(cancelAuthenticationFromDialog:)] autorelease];
00089         [items addObject:backButton];
00090         
00091         label = [[[UILabel alloc] initWithFrame:CGRectMake(0,0,170,50)] autorelease];
00092         if ([self type] == ASIProxyAuthenticationType) {
00093                 [label setText:[[self request] proxyHost]];
00094         } else {
00095                 [label setText:[[[self request] url] host]];
00096         }
00097         [label setTextColor:[UIColor whiteColor]];
00098         [label setFont:[UIFont boldSystemFontOfSize:22.0]];
00099         [label setShadowColor:[UIColor colorWithRed:0 green:0 blue:0 alpha:0.5]];
00100         [label setShadowOffset:CGSizeMake(0, -1.0)];
00101         [label setOpaque:NO];
00102         [label setBackgroundColor:nil];
00103         [label setTextAlignment:UITextAlignmentCenter];
00104         
00105         [toolbar addSubview:label];
00106 
00107         UIBarButtonItem *labelButton = [[[UIBarButtonItem alloc] initWithBarButtonSystemItem:UIBarButtonSystemItemCancel target:nil action:nil] autorelease];
00108         [labelButton setCustomView:label];
00109         [items addObject:labelButton];
00110         [items addObject:[[[UIBarButtonItem alloc] initWithTitle:@"Login" style:UIBarButtonItemStyleDone target:self action:@selector(loginWithCredentialsFromDialog:)] autorelease]];
00111         [toolbar setItems:items];
00112         
00113         [[self loginDialog] addSubview:toolbar];
00114         
00115         // Force reload the table content, and focus the first field to show the keyboard
00116         [table reloadData];
00117         [[[[table cellForRowAtIndexPath:[NSIndexPath indexPathForRow:0 inSection:0]] subviews] objectAtIndex:2] becomeFirstResponder];
00118         
00119 }
00120 
00121 - (void)cancelAuthenticationFromDialog:(id)sender
00122 {
00123         [[self request] cancelAuthentication];
00124         [[self loginDialog] dismissWithClickedButtonIndex:0 animated:YES];
00125 }
00126 
00127 - (void)loginWithCredentialsFromDialog:(id)sender
00128 {
00129         NSString *username = [[[[[[[self loginDialog] subviews] objectAtIndex:0] cellForRowAtIndexPath:[NSIndexPath indexPathForRow:0 inSection:0]] subviews] objectAtIndex:2] text];
00130         NSString *password = [[[[[[[self loginDialog] subviews] objectAtIndex:0] cellForRowAtIndexPath:[NSIndexPath indexPathForRow:0 inSection:1]] subviews] objectAtIndex:2] text];
00131         
00132         if ([self type] == ASIProxyAuthenticationType) {
00133                 [[self request] setProxyUsername:username];
00134                 [[self request] setProxyPassword:password];
00135         } else {
00136                 [[self request] setUsername:username];
00137                 [[self request] setPassword:password];          
00138         }
00139         
00140         // Handle NTLM domains
00141         NSString *scheme = ([self type] == ASIStandardAuthenticationType) ? [[self request] authenticationScheme] : [[self request] proxyAuthenticationScheme];
00142         if ([scheme isEqualToString:(NSString *)kCFHTTPAuthenticationSchemeNTLM]) {
00143                 NSString *domain = [[[[[[[self loginDialog] subviews] objectAtIndex:0] cellForRowAtIndexPath:[NSIndexPath indexPathForRow:0 inSection:2]] subviews] objectAtIndex:2] text];
00144                 if ([self type] == ASIProxyAuthenticationType) {
00145                         [[self request] setProxyDomain:domain];
00146                 } else {
00147                         [[self request] setDomain:domain];
00148                 }
00149         }
00150         
00151         [[self loginDialog] dismissWithClickedButtonIndex:1 animated:YES];
00152         [[self request] retryUsingSuppliedCredentials]; 
00153 }
00154 
00155 
00156 - (NSInteger)numberOfSectionsInTableView:(UITableView *)tableView
00157 {
00158         NSString *scheme = ([self type] == ASIStandardAuthenticationType) ? [[self request] authenticationScheme] : [[self request] proxyAuthenticationScheme];
00159         if ([scheme isEqualToString:(NSString *)kCFHTTPAuthenticationSchemeNTLM]) {
00160                 return 3;
00161         }
00162         return 2;
00163 }
00164 
00165 - (CGFloat)tableView:(UITableView *)tableView heightForFooterInSection:(NSInteger)section
00166 {
00167         if (section == [self numberOfSectionsInTableView:tableView]-1) {
00168                 return 30;
00169         }
00170         return 0;
00171 }
00172 
00173 - (CGFloat)tableView:(UITableView *)tableView heightForHeaderInSection:(NSInteger)section
00174 {
00175         if (section == 0) {
00176                 return 30;
00177         }
00178         return 0;
00179 }
00180 
00181 - (NSString *)tableView:(UITableView *)tableView titleForHeaderInSection:(NSInteger)section
00182 {
00183         if (section == 0) {
00184                 return [[self request] authenticationRealm];
00185         }
00186         return nil;
00187 }

00189 - (UITableViewCell *)tableView:(UITableView *)tableView cellForRowAtIndexPath:(NSIndexPath *)indexPath
00190 {
00191 #if __IPHONE_OS_VERSION_MIN_REQUIRED < __IPHONE_3_0
00192         UITableViewCell *cell = [[[UITableViewCell alloc] initWithFrame:CGRectZero reuseIdentifier:nil] autorelease];
00193 #else
00194         UITableViewCell *cell = [[[UITableViewCell alloc] initWithStyle:UITableViewCellStyleDefault reuseIdentifier:nil] autorelease];
00195 #endif
00196 
00197         [cell setSelectionStyle:UITableViewCellSelectionStyleNone];
00198         UITextField *textField = [[[UITextField alloc] initWithFrame:CGRectMake(20,12,260,25)] autorelease];
00199         [textField setAutocapitalizationType:UITextAutocapitalizationTypeNone];
00200         if ([indexPath section] == 0) {
00201                 [textField setPlaceholder:@"User"];
00202         } else if ([indexPath section] == 1) {
00203                 [textField setPlaceholder:@"Password"];
00204                 [textField setSecureTextEntry:YES];
00205         } else if ([indexPath section] == 2) {
00206                 [textField setPlaceholder:@"Domain"];
00207         }       
00208         [cell addSubview:textField];
00209         
00210         return cell;
00211 }
00212 
00213 - (NSInteger)tableView:(UITableView *)tableView numberOfRowsInSection:(NSInteger)section
00214 {
00215         return 1;
00216 }
00217 
00218 
00219 - (NSString *)tableView:(UITableView *)tableView titleForFooterInSection:(NSInteger)section
00220 {
00221         if (section == [self numberOfSectionsInTableView:tableView]-1) {
00222                 // If we're using Basic authentication and the connection is not using SSL, we'll show the plain text message
00223                 if ([[[self request] authenticationScheme] isEqualToString:(NSString *)kCFHTTPAuthenticationSchemeBasic] && ![[[[self request] url] scheme] isEqualToString:@"https"]) {
00224                         return @"Password will be sent in the clear.";
00225                 // We are using Digest, NTLM, or any scheme over SSL
00226                 } else {
00227                         return @"Password will be sent securely.";
00228                 }
00229         }
00230         return nil;
00231 }
